condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines are preserved on the top and left sides. Written with a thin pen in black ink which is effaced in some places, perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The papyrus fibers are frayed on the right side which has resulted in a loss of seven to ten letters at the beginning of lines 1-6. One large hole and a smaller one have resulted in a loss of text in the middle part of the last four lines. The bottom half is broken off.
